fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Customs, Business and Industry
eu_initiatives:
VF International is following EU initiatives, policies and legislative files on: 
- External trade policy 
- Intellectual property rights, innovation, 
and anti-counterfeiting policies 
- Global supply chain issues 
- Corporate social responsibility 
- Consumer & product safety
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: We're a dynamic, global powerhouse with over 30 dynamic lifestyle brands and over 70,000 associates working in locations across the globe.  Our brands are sold in more than 150 countries through 47,000 retailers in all channels of distribution, from mass to department to specialty retailers. In addition, we own and operate more than 1,000 retail stores. Many of our brands also sell products directly to consumers over the Internet.
